tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FactoryAutomationDowntimeData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  downtime_start TIMESTAMP,
  downtime_end TIMESTAMP,
  downtime_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FactoryAutomationDowntimeData (
   id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   machine_id UUID,
   downtime_start TIMESTAMP,
   downtime_end TIMESTAMP,
   downtime_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Factory_Downtime (
	ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
	Machine_ID INT,
	Start_Time TIMESTAMP,
	End_Time TIMESTAMP,
	Downtime_Reason VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE factory_production_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  downtime_duration INT,
  downtime_reason TEXT,
  downtime_datetime TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE machine_details (
  machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_name TEXT,
  machine_location TEXT,
  machine_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE production_bottlenecks (
  bottleneck_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bottleneck_description TEXT,
  bottleneck_category TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE production_efficiency (
  efficiency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  production_rate INT,
  efficiency_percentage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE DowntimeData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    downtime_start TIMESTAMP,
    downtime_end TIMESTAMP,
    downtime_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionBottlenecks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bottleneck_name TEXT,
    bottleneck_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Machines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name TEXT,
    machine_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionLines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    line_number INT,
    machines_in_line INT
)

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name TEXT,
    department TEXT
)
